author: mirror
title: Corrie actress Katie Mcglynn shows off perfect cleavage going braless in plunging satin tuxedo jacket
text:
TV Corrie actress Katie Mcglynn shows off perfect cleavage going braless in plunging satin tuxedo jacket The 22-year-old, who plays dowdy Sinead Tinker, narrowly avoided a wardrobe malfunction as she dined out with a pal Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's an outfit which would probably make Roy Cropper drop his trademark carrier bag - but luckily for Corrie actress Katie Mcglynn , she was off duty when she opted for this very revealing look. 
Blonde Katie would have caused her dowdy Corrie character to blush in her Saturday night garb, showing off her perfect cleavage by going braless and blouseless in a dramatic satin lined tuxedo. 
The 22-year-old had added a grey tinge to her long flowing locks which she kept loose over her shoulders for her night out in Manchester at Australasia restaurant. Coronation Street' actress Katie Mcglynn goes for gold with the outfit (Photo: FameFlynet) Katie and her pal huddled close leaving the restaurant (Photo: FameFlynet) How we are used to seeing Katie on our screens (Photo: ITV) 
Inside the restaurant the young actress carried on posting seriously booby selfies as she posed up next to her dinner. 
Her character, Sinead Tinker, is set to be a hit with a surprise pregnancy which will see her and lover Daniel Osbourne tackle the option of abortion - behind boyfriend Chesney Brown's back. 
The character, played by Katie McGlynn , was spotted outside a termination clinic as scenes were recorded for broadcast later this month. 
Her pregnancy comes as Sinead cheats on Chesney with Daniel in the Underworld factory, leaving her in a rather difficult scenario. Coronation Street' actress Katie Mcglynn (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Discussing the sensitive storyline, Katie explained to The Sun : “Sinead and Chesney have been together forever and she’s just grown up. They’ve been arguing. 
"Daniel sees a quirky girl in Sinead and he calls her mysterious and exotic. The situation with Chesney kind of pushes them together.” 
“They first sleep together in the factory. Daniel needs somewhere quiet to study and Sinead keeps doing overtime at the factory so she invites him to work there." Like us on Facebook
